com.esri.mo2.map.core
Interface Layout

All Superinterfaces:
Canvas, ElementContainer, Searchable, Selectable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseLayout, PageLayout
public interface Layout
extends ElementContainer, Canvas

Layout interface adds more functionality on top of the ElementContainer such as getting all the added elements, selected elements and MapElement(s), and creating images for the given size and extent including thumbnail images for the whole layout. It also defines functions to group and ungroup a set of elements and construction of a Map and OverviewMap for either client side or server side applications.

setSelectionSetElements

public void setSelectionSetElements(SelectionSet sset)
Sets all elements that are specified by the given SelectionSet. The SelectionSet is not necessarily the same as the GraphicsLayer's current SelectionSet - it can have been separately generated by invoking the underlying Selectable's select() method.

Parameters:
sset - a SelectionSet identifying the elements to be removed

removeSingleElement

public void removeSingleElement(Element element)
Removes the given element only. It differs from the removeElement() method that the removeElement method will automatically remove its assocaited elements if it's a MapElement or contained elements if it's a GroupElement

Parameters:
element -
